mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.time AS "time", a.score AS "score", a.pass_flag AS "passFlag", a.pay_flag AS "payFlag", a.pay_money AS "payMoney", a.exam_count AS "examCount", a.fail_reason AS "failReason", a.sid AS "sid"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam( id, name, time, score, pass_flag, pay_flag, pay_money, exam_count, fail_reason, sid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{time}, #{score}, #{passFlag}, #{payFlag}, #{payMoney}, #{examCount}, #{failReason}, #{sid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exam SET name = #{name}, time = #{time}, score = #{score}, pass_flag = #{passFlag}, pay_flag = #{payFlag}, pay_money = #{payMoney}, exam_count = #{examCount}, fail_reason = #{failReason}, sid = #{sid} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM exam where sid=#{sid} and name=#{NAME} and pass_flag=0 or pass_flag=2
